abstract: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
snippet: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
lead_paragraph: Crain's New York Business: An upstate farm threatened with bankruptcy because of Hurricane Irene has offered a 50-pound bag of onions for $150,000 on eBay, to get attention and maybe some money to ease a $200,000 debt. -- Nick Fox
